content: Captain Wise-Voice is a required Yaoguai King boss fight, and one of four "Captains" that you can encounter in Chapter 3 of Black Myth Wukong. Responsible for the "beguiling chant" that curses you in the Pagoda Realm, you can find this boss inside the Mani Wheel at the top of the prison.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Captain_Wise-Voice.md', within the main section titled 'Captain Wise-Voice'.
The content is as follows:
Captain Wise-Voice is a required Yaoguai King boss fight, and one of four "Captains" that you can encounter in Chapter 3 of Black Myth Wukong. Responsible for the "beguiling chant" that curses you in the Pagoda Realm, you can find this boss inside the Mani Wheel at the top of the prison.
